com.ikalagaming.logging

Class LoggingPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.logging.LoggingPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Package

    public class LoggingPackage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Package
    Handles reporting and logging errors.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • logError

        public void logError(Package origin,
            java.lang.String error,
            LoggingLevel level,
            java.lang.String details)
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the error code and logging level. This only logs errors that are above or equal to the threshold. The package name is listed before the info.
        If the package is not enabled, simply logs straight to System.err
        Parameters:
        origin - The package that is logging the error
        error - The error that occurred
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - additional information about the error

      • log

        public void log(Package origin,
       LoggingLevel level,
       java.lang.String details)
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the logging level. This only logs information that is above or equal to the logging threshold.
        If the package is not enabled, simply logs straight to System.out
        Parameters:
        origin - The package that is logging the info
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - what to log

      • disable

        public boolean disable()
        Description copied from interface: Package
        Deactivates the package and halts all of its operations. The package is still loaded in memory but not active. Calls Package.onDisable().
        Specified by:
        disable in interface Package
        Returns:
        true if the package has been successfully disabled
